thread.title: A Belgian supermarket with a fresh take on fair trade

title: A Belgian supermarket with a fresh take on fair trade
text:
A Belgian supermarket with a fresh take on fair trade  40 
A new non-profit supermarket in Brussels is seeking to offer a fairer deal to farmers. As Kate King reports, bigger firms might be forced to follow suit after the European Commission on Thursday proposed measures to ban some unfair trade practices.   
A new non-profit supermarket in Brussels is seeking to offer a fairer deal to farmers. As Kate King reports, bigger firms might be forced to follow suit after the European Commission on Thursday proposed measures to ban some unfair trade practices.  //reut.rs/2JKItYS
